{"step_by_step_thinking": "Dentin is a hard tissue that makes up the bulk of the tooth. It is composed of organic and inorganic components. The inorganic component of dentin is primarily hydroxyapatite, which is a mineral made up of calcium and phosphate. The organic component of dentin includes collagen fibers. Based on this information, we can determine the percentage of inorganic content in dentin.", "answer_choice": "A. 70% inorganic"}
